column5: Cozy 2 story house... 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, living area with TV, wifi. Fully equiped kitchen and laundry room. Conveniently located 3 minutes from Sea world , 15 minutes to The Rim and Six Flags, Located blocks away from Lackland AFB. 16 miles from Downtown San Antonio.
column8: Entire Spacious Home Near Sea World and Lackland
